description: 导航栏组件，支持吸顶和沉浸式，支持在指定滚动位置展示，支持根据滚动位置实时更新style。

descriptionTags.en: Navigation bar, supports ceiling and immersion, supports display at specified scroll position, and supports real-time update of style according to scroll position.
descriptionTags.name: 导航栏

title.description:
导航栏中间文字，带居中和溢出省略效果
@en Navigation bar middle text, with centering and overflow omitting effects
title.name: title

tags.en: Navigation bar middle text, with centering and overflow omitting effects

title.descWithTags: 导航栏中间文字，带居中和溢出省略效果

children.description:
自定义导航栏主内容，当导航栏内容为Tabs等非居中文字样式时可用
@en Customize the main content of the navigation bar, available when the content of the navigation bar is a non-centered text style such as Tabs
children.name: children

tags.en: Customize the main content of the navigation bar, available when the content of the navigation bar is a non-centered text style such as Tabs

children.descWithTags: 自定义导航栏主内容，当导航栏内容为Tabs等非居中文字样式时可用

leftContent.name: leftContent

tags.en: Navigation bar left content

rightContent.description:
导航栏右侧内容
@en Content on the right side of the navigation bar
rightContent.name: rightContent

tags.en: Content on the right side of the navigation bar

style.description:
自定义样式，背景和文字颜色可在此定义
@en Custom stylesheet, background and text colors can be defined here
style.name: style

tags.en: Custom stylesheet, background and text colors can be defined here

style.descWithTags: 自定义样式，背景和文字颜色可在此定义

tags.en: Custom classname

wrapClass.description:
最外层元素自定义类名
@en Outermost element custom classname
wrapClass.name: wrapClass

tags.en: Outermost element custom classname

wrapClass.descWithTags: 最外层元素自定义类名

fixed.description:
是否吸顶
@en Whether to fix
fixed.name: fixed

tags.en: Whether to fix

statusBarHeight.description:
沉浸式状态栏高度
@en Immersive status bar height
statusBarHeight.name: statusBarHeight

tags.en: Immersive status bar height

hasBottomLine.description:
是否有底边框
@en Whether there is a bottom border
hasBottomLine.name: hasBottomLine

tags.en: Whether there is a bottom border

onClickLeft.description:
点击左侧内容回调
@en Callback when clicking the content on the left
onClickLeft.name: onClickLeft

tags.en: Callback when clicking the content on the left

onClickRight.description:
点击右侧内容回调
@en Callback when clicking the content on the right
onClickRight.name: onClickRight

tags.en: Callback when clicking the content on the right

showOffset.description:
展示nav-bar的offset值，当scrollTop值小于该值时，将隐藏主内容和右侧内容，左侧内容保留
@en Display the offset value of nav-bar. When the scrollTop value is less than this value, the main content and the right content will be hidden, and the left content will remain
showOffset.name: showOffset

tags.en: Display the offset value of nav-bar. When the scrollTop value is less than this value, the main content and the right content will be hidden, and the left content will remain

showOffset.descWithTags: 展示nav-bar的offset值，当scrollTop值小于该值时，将隐藏主内容和右侧内容，左侧内容保留

onShowChange.description:
设置showOffset后，当内容显示状态发生变化后触发
@en After setting showOffset, triggered when the content display state changes
onShowChange.name: onShowChange

tags.en: After setting showOffset, triggered when the content display state changes

onShowChange.descWithTags: 设置showOffset后，当内容显示状态发生变化后触发

placeholder.description:
设置fixed=true时，导航栏原本的位置是否要占住
@en When fixed=true is set, whether the original position of the navigation bar should be occupied
placeholder.name: placeholder

tags.en: When fixed=true is set, whether the original position of the navigation bar should be occupied

placeholder.descWithTags: 设置fixed=true时，导航栏原本的位置是否要占住

extra.description:
额外渲染元素，与inner平级
@en Additional render elements, level with inner
extra.name: extra

tags.en: Additional render elements, level with inner

getScrollContainer.description:
自定义滚动元素，不传默认是window
@en Custom scrolling element, default is window if not input
getScrollContainer.name: getScrollContainer

tags.en: Custom scrolling element, default is window if not input

getScrollContainer.descWithTags: 自定义滚动元素，不传默认是window

getComputedStyleByScroll.description:
根据滚动offset值设置自定义style，设置该属性后将监听滚动容器的滚动事件
@en Set a custom style according to the scroll offset value. After setting this property, the scroll event of the scroll container will be monitored.
getComputedStyleByScroll.name: getComputedStyleByScroll

tags.en: Set a custom style according to the scroll offset value. After setting this property, the scroll event of the scroll container will be monitored.

getComputedStyleByScroll.descWithTags: 根据滚动offset值设置自定义style，设置该属性后将监听滚动容器的滚动事件

onScrollChange.description:
滚动时回调，设置该属性后将监听滚动容器的滚动事件
@en Callback when scrolling. After setting this property, the scroll event of the scroll container will be monitored.
onScrollChange.name: onScrollChange

tags.en: Callback when scrolling. After setting this property, the scroll event of the scroll container will be monitored.

onScrollChange.descWithTags: 滚动时回调，设置该属性后将监听滚动容器的滚动事件

ariaLabel.description:
无障碍aria-label属性
@en Accessibility attribute aria-label
ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel

tags.en: Accessibility attribute aria-label

ariaRole.description:
无障碍role属性
@en Accessibility attribute role
ariaRole.name: ariaRole

tags.en: Accessibility attribute role

dom.name: dom
dom.description:
最外层元素DOM
@en The outermost element DOM

tags.en: The outermost element DOM
